Description: Text must have sufficient contrast against background
Requirement: 4.5:1 for normal text 3:1 for large text
Testing Method: Use axe DevTools or Lighthouse audit

Description: All images must have descriptive alt text
Requirement: Meaningful alt for informative images empty alt for decorative
Code Example:
// Informative image
<Image
  src="/product.jpg"
  alt={t('product.altText')} // Localized!
/>
// Decorative image
<Image
  src="/decoration.svg"
  alt=""
  aria-hidden="true"
/>
Testing Method: Screen reader testing check alt attributes

Description: All functionality must be accessible via keyboard
Requirement: Tab to navigate Enter/Space to activate Escape to close
Testing Method: Tab through entire site test all interactions

Requirement: Clear visual indication of focused element
Testing Method: Tab through interface verify focus is visible

Description: Provide skip links to bypass repeated content
Requirement: Skip to main content link at page start
Code Example: // First element in body {t('a11y.skipToContent')}
Testing Method: Tab at page start verify skip link appears

Description: All form inputs must have associated labels
Requirement: Use htmlFor or wrap input in label
Testing Method: Check for label associations in DevTools

Description: Errors must be clearly identified and described
Testing Method: Trigger validation errors test screen reader

Requirement: One h1 per page headings in order without skipping
Code Example:
// Correct hierarchy

{t('page.title')}

{t('section.title')}

{t('subsection.title')}

// Never skip levels (h1 -> h3)

Description: Page language must be programmatically set
Requirement: html lang attribute matches content language
Testing Method: Check html lang attribute in DevTools

Description: Respect user preferences for reduced motion
Requirement: Disable or reduce animations when preferred
Testing Method: Test with reduce motion preference enabled
